haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Ltn Patrik Schorner
Ltn Florian Lasch
Fw Gunther Huwyler
Fw Ralf Schulz

 The mission was flown from Bonneuil Ferme aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 11/05/1916 near Ugny.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc 37 was brought down by Florian Lasch of Jasta 4.
Edmond Dambreville was made a prisoner of war.
Florian Lasch was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 11/05/1916 near Epagny.
A F.E.2b of Esc 19 was brought down by Nikolaus Schildhauer of Jasta 4.
S/Lt Mattieu Lamor was killed in action.
S/Lt Marc Jobard was killed in action.
Nikolaus Schildhauer was  flying a Fokker E.III.

On 11/05/1916 near Ugny.
A Nieuport 17.C1 GBR of Esc 37 was brought down by Gunther Huwyler of Jasta 4.
Charles Lacoste was killed in action.
Gunther Huwyler was  flying a Fokker E.III.
narrative: All is well that ends well.  We are attacked by several Nieuports.  In a swirling fight I am hit and my crate goes down.  Remarkably, I walk away.  Lasch and Huwlyer both score, so my sacrifice is not in vain.
